comments: a(n) is a square when n is not a square or of the form (2m^2)^2=4m^4.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (Haskell)a045661 n = product [n'+d | d <- [1..n], let (n',m) = divMod n d, m == 0]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 02 2012, Jan 25 2012(PARI) a(n)=my(t=1);fordiv(n,d,t*=n/d+d);t \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 25 2012(PARI) A045661(n)=my(t=1+#n=divisors(n));prod(i=1,(t-1)\2,n[i]+n[t-i])^2*if(bittest(t,0),1,2*n[t\2]) \\ _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 25 2012
author: _Wouter Meeussen_
